title: Recommendation Systems
subject: Machine Learning
theory:
Suggesting items users might like. 
- **Content Based**: You liked Star Wars, here is Star Trek (Similar Item).
- **Collaborative**: You are like Bob. Bob liked Toy Story. Here is Toy Story (Similar User).

interview_questions.question: Cold Start Problem?
interview_questions.answer: New user has no history. use Popularity based or explicit survey.

real_world_use_cases.description: 75% of what people watch is from recommendations.
